field.label: License Key
field.comment: Please enter license key for this extension that was emailed by us to you after your purchase.

field.label: Is Multi Store
field.comment: If your website has multiple stores with different URLs then set this option to Yes and contact us for register multi-store license key.

field.label: Top Menu Alignment
field.comment: "From Center" does not work when you are displaying or enabling "Show All Category Under One Menu"

field.label: Show Top Level Category Arrow
field.comment: If the main category has subcategory then display arrow icon with the category name. Learn more

field.label: Show Top Level Category Icon
field.comment: Display top level categories icons. Learn more

field.label: Mega Menu Image Source
field.comment: Choose from where you want to display all the category images in mega menu at the front-end. Learn more

field.label: Contact Form Position
field.comment:
Choose the position of the Contact Us link in the mega menu. Learn more
NOTE: If you set "Yes" here then we please set the "Top Menu Alignment" option to "From Left". You can find the "Top Menu Alignment" option under the General Settings of Mega Menu.

field.label: Contact Us Menu Content
field.comment: Please add content for contact us menu.

field.label: Add Underline To Link
field.comment: Add underline to link when the mouse hovers on it.

field.label: Show View More
field.comment: This option is only for level 1 categories (Top Categories), if you want to set "View More" for subcategories then you can do it from that specific category page at the admin side. Learn more

field.label: Masonry.js
field.comment: Masonry is a JavaScript grid layout library. It works by placing elements in optimal position based on available vertical space, sort of like a mason fitting stones in a wall. You’ve probably seen it in use all over the Internet. Learn more

field.label: Masonry.js - Select Categories
field.comment: Masonry.js enabled for selected category.

field.label: Click and Open Drop-down Behaviour
field.comment: Choose whether you want to open drop-down only when clicking on the arrow icon OR open drop-down when clicking on the category name too.. Learn more

field.label: Show Social Share Icon
field.comment: NOTE: If you set "Yes" here then we please set the "Top Menu Alignment" option to "From Left". You can find the "Top Menu Alignment" option under the General Settings of Mega Menu.
